nodes.text: The transit bridge was a bridge in the Network Security District of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Empire occupied the bridge, using it as their forward base in the district.
The transit bridge appears as part of the Network Security District on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game released by BioWare in 2011.
